meanings.sent1: She expunges all the errors from her homework before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: The delete key on the keyboard expunges the text with a single press.
meanings.sent3: The magic eraser expunges any trace of the drawing on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Time expunges memories like waves washing away footprints in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The cleaning solution expunges stubborn stains effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The antivirus software expunges harmful viruses from the computer system.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's mission is to expunge evil from the city.
meanings.sent3: The brave knight expunges the dragon from the kingdom with a swift strike.
meanings.sent4: His determination expunges any doubts that may arise.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gradually expunges the darkness of the night.

meanings.sent1: The floodwaters expunge the fragile sandcastle from the beach.
meanings.sent2: The volcanic eruption expunges all signs of life in its path.
meanings.sent3: The eraser expunges the mistake on the paper without a trace.
meanings.sent4: The storm's fury expunges the peaceful atmosphere in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind expunges the clouds, revealing a clear blue sky.
